project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that interacts with a public API to fetch and display current weather information for a specified city.

task.name: Implement the functionality to fetch weather data from the public API
Parse the API response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement command line interface to input the city name
Display the fetched weather information in the terminal
Write tests for each of the functionalities above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
